title: Bit.ly
details: Bit.ly is a company that provide an service to shorten some urls in other to make it easier to share. And some apps use this on background during sharing links of posts, medias, etc.

title: Embed.ly
details: Embed provides you with a tool to grow by adding media to your site.

title: PostalCode
details: It's a great service to test and validate completely an Address Location.

title: Experian Aperture
details: Experian API for home address validation.

title: Elastic APM
details: It's commonly found in web applications using AWS APM, where the host usually is https://ANY_NAME.apm.AWS-REGION.aws.cloud.es.io It uses an Beaerer token with about 18 characters.

title: DropBox
details: Sharing online folders and setting permissions to files.

commands.command: curl -X POST https://api.dropboxapi.com/2/sharing/add_folder_member --header "Authorization: Bearer {{ACCESS_TOKEN}}" --header "Content-Type: application/json" --data "{\"custom_message\":\"Come on and access the files\",\"members\":[{\"access_level\":\"editor\",\"member\":{\".tag\":\"email\",\"email\":\"{{EMAIL_TO_INVITE}}\"}},{\"access_level\":\"viewer\",\"member\":{\".tag\":\"dropbox_id\",\"dropbox_id\":\"{{DROPBOX_ID_FOUND_ON_FIRST_REQUEST}}\"}}],\"quiet\":false,\"shared_folder_id\":\"{{FOLDER_ID}}\"}"

title: Contentful
details: Contentful has 3 kinds of services, the most common to see in clientside is the CDN one, which the application uses an bearer token to retrieve static files like PDFs, XLSX and others.

title: Blip Chat (Widget)
details: Blipchat is a bot chat commonly used. Normally, the key exposed on client-side do not have an direct impact, but if there is no domain restriction set on Blip configuration, it allows you to load the company chat configuration on your website.

title: Blip Chat (Messaging)
details: The same chat bot, but this key should be private and not exposed. It can allow an attacker to send SMS to users phone and emails as he wants. Besides that, allows the attacker to list all conversations avaiable with chatbot and edit some configurations.

title: Loqate (Addressy)
details: Loqate provides a service to validate addresses, phone numbers and emails. It is commonly used in forms to validate user input. The API key is usually in this format: AA11-AA11-AA11-AA11

title: Firebase Remote Config Mobile
details:
Firebase Remote Config is a cloud service that lets you change the behavior and appearance of your app without publishing an update. The AppID format is usually: 1:111111111111:android:aaa11111a11111a1a1aaa1. The project ID is usually in the format: my-project-id-123456 or the second group after the colon in the AppID.

Credits to: phor3nsic and brunovais

title: Firebase Web Config
details:
Firebase Web Config is a cloud service that lets you change the behavior and appearance of your web app without publishing an update. The AppID format is usually: 1:111111111111:web:aaa11111a11111a1a1aaa1. The project ID is usually in the format: my-project-id-123456 or the second group after the colon in the AppID.

Credits to: phor3nsic and brunovais

title: Vimeo
details: Vimeo is a video hosting platform that allows users to upload, share, and view videos. The API key is usually in the format: 1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678.

title: Sentry
details:
Sentry is an error tracking and performance monitoring platform that helps developers identify and fix issues in their applications. The auth_token is usually a SHA256 string.

Credits to: thay

title: HubSpot
details:
Hubspot is a popular CRM and marketing platform. Example of the API Private Token: pat-na1-12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab.

Credits to: phor3nsic

commands.command:
for url in "https://api.hubapi.com/integrations/v1/me" \
"https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts" \
"https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/companies" \
"https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals" \
"https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/tickets" \
"https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/owners" \
"https://api.hubapi.com/properties/v1/contacts/properties" \
"https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/search" \
"https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/lists" \
"https://api.hubapi.com/crm-pipelines/v1/pipelines/deals" \
"https://api.hubapi.com/email/public/v1/events"; 
do curl -sik "$url" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer {{HUBSPOT_PRIVATE_TOKEN}}" \
-H "Accept: application/json" && echo -e '\n======'; 
done
commands.desc: All HubSpot paths in one command.

title: NPM Registry
details: NPM Registry is a public repository for JavaScript packages. The API allows you to fetch package information, versions, and other metadata. The token is usually in the format: 12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab.
